|brand = ALFA Network |model = AWUS051NH |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = October 4, 2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ALFA_Network_AWUS051NH_v1 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Female Mini-B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter
|vendor_id = 148f |device_id = 2770 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = UQ205 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:C0:CA
|chip1 = Ralink;RT2770;RT2770F, N0H4960D0, 0928ST; |chip2 = Ralink;RT2750;RT2750L, CW56790A0, 0749ST; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 150/150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Accton |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;SiGe;SE2537L;SiGe, 2537L, 7326Q;1; ,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6691;692, 6691, A911;1; |flags = high power |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/22/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00286CNKO |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The FCC ID for this model is actually 'UQ205' (UQ2051NH is the ID printed onto the label).
The LEDs on this model are green and considerably less annoying than the [[ALFA Network AWUS050NH v1]].
'''ALFA''' seems to indicate that there is a V2 of this device using RT3572 based on the [https://web.archive.org/web/20171125033539/https://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=67&ps=241 AWUS051NH v2 product page]. :[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ll86U2Llm-o This YouTube video] shows the v2 board, indeed, using RT3572
==Links of Interest== ===Vendor links=== *[http://store.rokland.com/products/alfa-awus051nh-802-11n-dual-band-300-mbps-wireless-n-usb-adapter On '''Rokland'''] *[http://www.data-alliance.net/servlet/-strse-229/Alfa-500mW-802.11n-USB/Detail On '''data-alliance''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:AWUS051NH top.jpg|unit top File:AWUS051NH bot.jpg|unit bottom </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:AWUS051NH board top.jpg|board top File:AWUS051NH board bot.jpg|board bottom File:AWUS051NH_PCB_top.jpg|top of the PCB, RF shield removed, scan File:AWUS051NH_PCB_bot.jpg|bottom of the PCB, scan </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==Notes== ===Additional specifications=== This information is per [http://site.microcom.us/AWUS051NH.pdf this datasheet on '''Microcom''''s site].
